query: KONG® TRAVEL – ULTIMATE BOOSTER SEAT & TETHER
description: The KONG® Travel – Ultimate Booster Seat & Tether is designed for pet owners who prioritize safety and comfort during car rides. This booster seat elevates your pet, providing a clear view of the surroundings while ensuring they remain secure with the included tether. Ideal for small to medium-sized dogs, it is perfect for road trips, vet visits, or any travel scenario where your pet's safety is paramount. The durable materials and easy installation make it a necessary accessory for any pet-friendly vehicle.
